content: {A抱歉}Ah! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, please wait a moment. Our planet has grown quite a bit.
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3

content: And during this time, through your ecological observation efforts, you've also gained a deeper understanding of its environment.
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Please use your device to receive the expansion pack: <style=SizeBig>Planet Landscaping!</style>
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3

content: You may shape the planet however you choose. Wish for a mountain, and raise it high. Wish for a river, and carve its path.
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A笑哈哈}Hohoho... Think of our planet as a blank canvas, ready for you to create the scenery you've always imagined. And if there's anything you need, just say the word.
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A灵光一现}So, I've submitted an application to Loomi Co. for an expansion of our Planetmaker services. I believe this is also something you've been looking forward to, ahem...
info: 改地形岛建-莫白_主流程文本3
